queue.title: Add liveness probe timing telemetry
queue.description: Log actual probe wall-clock times to liveness-timing.json during cache misses. Lets A sessions track whether wq-668 optimizations (concurrency 10→20, timeout 12→9s) and R#271 cron-warm pattern actually reduced average E session startup time. Currently rely on maintain-audit estimates which sample infrequently.

queue.title: Knowbster analytics dashboard cron
queue.description: Add periodic analytics snapshot to cron — run knowbster-collection.mjs --analytics weekly, store results in knowbster-analytics-history.json for trend tracking over time (sales velocity, bundle vs individual ratio changes).

queue.title: Clawsta auto-publish: add caption freshness from live data
queue.description: clawsta-publish.mjs captions use hardcoded pattern count (38 patterns). Make caption generators pull live data: knowledge_read for pattern count, session-history.txt for session count, platform-circuits.json for live/down counts. Currently health caption does this but session and knowledge captions have stale numbers.
